messages.title: STANDING WITH THERESA MAY
messages.content: PAUL HOLMES, Southampton Test, standing with Theresa May.

GIVE ME AND MY CANDIDATE YOUR VOTE ON THURSDAY 8TH JUNE AND I WILL: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country, Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future, Always stand up for you and your family, Don't risk our future at this crucial moment in history with a vote for anyone else. Back me on Thursday 8th June to lead Britain. - Theresa May, Prime Minister.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting for continued investment in our schools and hospitals.
Supporting our local businesses to ensure strong and vibrant High Streets.
Ensuring Southampton gets a good deal from Brexit and making the most of the opportunities it presents.

issues.brexitEurope: Ensuring Southampton gets a good deal from Brexit and making the most of the opportunities it presents.
